an5.184:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these five kinds of people who dwell in a charnel ground.
an5.184:4.3: A person may dwell in a charnel ground because of stupidity … bad desires … madness … because it is praised by the Buddhas … or for the sake of having few wishes …
an5.184:4.4: These are the five kinds of people who dwell in a charnel ground.”
